name: Ludum Dare 45 - Epoch
description:
In this game you will steer the progress into new ages through combining items. Starting with only a stick and a stone, you will be able to harvest crops, breed animals and finally build houses. As of today, we only covered the stone age. Let us know what you think about our game and if we should keep adding more epochs.

If you want to see more ages let us know and we will continue work on it.
